hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT CODE_RATE_D_ID, CODE_RATE_ID, CREATED_BY, TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS CREATION_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS END_DATE, IS_ACTIVE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE, PERCENTAGE, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS START_DATE FROM WC_NT_CODE_RATE_D WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO WC_NT_CODE_RATE_D ( CODE_RATE_D_ID, CODE_RATE_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, END_DATE, IS_ACTIVE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, PERCENTAGE, START_DATE ) VALUES ( ${CODE_RATE_D_ID}, ${CODE_RATE_ID}, ${CREATED_BY}, ${CREATION_DATE}, ${END_DATE}, ${IS_ACTIVE}, ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, ${PERCENTAGE}, ${START_DATE} )

UPDATE WC_NT_CODE_RATE_D SET CODE_RATE_D_ID = ${CODE_RATE_D_ID}, CODE_RATE_ID = ${CODE_RATE_ID}, CREATED_BY = ${CREATED_BY}, CREATION_DATE = ${CREATION_DATE}, END_DATE = ${END_DATE}, IS_ACTIVE = ${IS_ACTIVE}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, PERCENTAGE = ${PERCENTAGE}, START_DATE = ${START_DATE} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
